"Raising your Power Level: Part 1":
"\"Power Level\" is a way to quantify a player's combat ability based on their status and their equipment.

You may not be able to participate in some quests or enter some areas until you meet their minimum Power Level requirement."

"If you want to raise your Power Level, you have several options:
・Defeat enemies, clear Side Tasks etc. to gain EXP and raise your class level
・Equip more powerful weapons and armor, or make the ones you already have stronger, for instance by Grinding them
・Make sure you have all 3 armor slots filled"

"If you are short on weapons or armor, you can buy more at the Item Shop at the ARKS base in each region.

To buy items, you will need N-Meseta."
